text: Pheri jaba tiniharule unala'i lage, ra sabai ekamata bha'e ki unala'i e'uta ekantako gahiro inarama halidiyau, ta hamile yusupha (alais'silama) tira tyahi sandesa pathayamai ki eka samaya yasto a'umnecha ki timile tiniharusita yasako barema bhannechau ra tiniharula'i timro barema kunai jnana hunechaina
